data.title: Bank Holidays in December 2019 – Know to plan your financial activities
meta_keywords: bank holiday in December 2019 bank holiday in december holiday in India bank holiday bank holiday in dec 2019
data.meta_description: December, the last month of the year 2019 has already started and you will need to take the necessary steps to close the year successfully as well as prepare yourself very well to invite the approaching New Year 2020 enthusiastically. Most activities of our personal, familial, professional, business and social lives revolve around financial transactions.
data.text:
December, the last month of the year 2019 has already started and you will need to take the necessary steps to close the year successfully as well as prepare yourself very well to invite the approaching New Year 2020 enthusiastically. Most activities of our personal, familial, professional, business and social lives revolve around financial transactions. Hence we are highly dependent on banks for many things. Know the bank holidays for the whole of India for the month of December 2019 to be able to plan many things without hassles. Plan your financial activities well in advance to avoid last minute disappointments and tensions. Read below to know on which dates the banks will not be available this month for any financial transactions.

The Banks are close on Second and Fourth Saturdays and Sundays. Accepting these days, the banks will remain closed across all the states only on December 25 for Christmas which falls on Wednesday. The other holidays mentioned in the list pertain to different states and hence the banks will function on these days in other states if these state specific events do not fall on weekend holidays.
